channel.title: Streaming Black Mesa
channel.description:
Hey guys what's up I'm going to stream a playthrough of Black Mesa with additional commentary from my friend Bojaxc.
Can be seen here: [url]https://www.twitch.tv/davidxkong#[/url]
Anyways having already played through it I thought it was pretty well done in graphics and music, the only thing I think was a bit off was the game balance with the aliens being too easy and marines too difficult. Overall though great job for the dev team I am a big fan of Half-Life and have been following Black Mesa since middle school, can't wait for the Xen levels!

item.title: Streaming Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: DavidxKong
item.description:
Hey guys what’s up I’m going to stream a playthrough of Black Mesa with additional commentary from my friend Bojaxc.

Can be seen here:
https://www.twitch.tv/davidxkong#

Anyways having already played through it I thought it was pretty well done in graphics and music, the only thing I think was a bit off was the game balance with the aliens being too easy and marines too difficult. Overall though great job for the dev team I am a big fan of Half-Life and have been following Black Mesa since middle school, can’t wait for the Xen levels!
